{"id":1267601928,"question_id":3420,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"8 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1716649938,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"215 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1267601928/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find Occurrences of an Element in an Array","memory":"194.2 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    vector<int> occurrencesOfElement(vector<int>& nums, vector<int>& queries, int x) {\n        vector<int> ans(queries.size(), -1);\n\n        unordered_map<int, vector<int>> nums_count;\n        for(int i=0; i<nums.size(); i++) {\n            nums_count[nums[i]].push_back(i);\n        }\n\n        vector<int> x_count;\n        if(nums_count.find(x) == nums_count.end())\n            return ans;\n        else\n            x_count = nums_count[x];\n\n        for(int i=0; i<queries.size(); i++) {\n            if(x_count.size() < queries[i])\n                ans[i] = -1;\n            else {\n                ans[i] = x_count[queries[i]-1];\n            }\n\n        }\n        return ans;\n\n        \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-occurrences-of-an-element-in-an-array","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
